Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: For Howard Beck, the Times reporter who covered the N.B.A. lockout, the 149-day ordeal was spent inside and outside some of New York’s finest hotels.
snippet: For Howard Beck, the Times reporter who covered the N.B.A. lockout, the 149-day ordeal was spent inside and outside some of New York’s finest hotels.
